name: African American Art and Culture Complex
description: We live our mission of nurturing and facilitating the empowerment of our community through Afro-centric artistic and cultural expression, education and programming. A host of studies prove the validity of arts and arts education. We know unequivocally that arts education acts as scaffolding that allows youth attain life skills above and beyond those learned in a specific artistic discipline. whatTheyOffer: They live their mission of nurturing and facilitating the empowerment of the community through Afro-centric artistic and cultural expression, education and programming. A host of studies prove the validity of arts and arts education. The arts draw on a range of skills and abilities that encourage the development of study, social, and personal skills.
